initial_question.title: can't compile (BLE related)
initial_question.body:
I installed `ESP-IDF 5.4.0` and tried to build your code. But I got some error:

```
firmware/main/gap.h:4:10: fatal error: host/ble_hs.h: No such file or directory
```

Within the main.c I got three include errors:

```
#include "gap.h"
#include "gatt_svr.h"
#include "esp_bt.h"
```

This files can't be fully resolved (because of transient dependencies).

satisfaction_conditions: BLE/NIMBLE dependencies are properly enabled in the project configuration
Project configuration is properly initialized before build
